channel.title: Thinknology - Mixes By ThinkToy
channel.description: Eclectic DJ mixes of diverse dance, hip-hop & emotive electronica. Across genres & tempos...chillout to dancefloor...from neurofunk to intelligent techno. Hopefully it will connect with either your head or your feet. Music featured includes breakbeat, jazzfunk & hip-hop to electronica, techno, electro & drum & bass. Full track listings with reference times can be found at the ThinkToy website...just follow the link. Updated weekly, this podcast also includes the latest hour long 'Thinknology Radio' mixes.
channel.itunes:author: ThinkToy
channel.itunes:subtitle: Eclectic DJ mixes of diverse dance, hip-hop & electronica. Updated weekly.
channel.itunes:keywords: think toy, dj mix, chillout, techno, electro, minimal house, ambient, downbeat, lounge, idm, electronica, tech house, drum n bass, dub, jazz, funk, soul, mashup, breakcore, ragga, grime, trip hop, breaks, postrock, music, hiphop, eclectic, dance

item.title: ThinkToy Halloween Mix
item.description:
ThinkToy - ' Halloween Special: 'Chillout Turns Chilling'
Track Listing:
1. Biosphere - 'The Shield' [Apollo] 2. In The Nursery - 'Paper Desert' [BNE] 3. Phume - 'So Many Times' [SSR/Crammed Discs] 4. Aza & Eoin - 'Nex 1' [Psychonavigation] 5. Quench - 'Sin' [Aim] 6. Dan Warren - 'Surrender' [CDR] 7. DJ Wally - 'My Bloody Valentine' (Nitty Mix) [Mo'Wax] 8. Slab - 'Rabbit's Moon' (Squelch Mix) [BMG] 9. Monolake - 'Bicom' [Monolake/Imbalance Computer Music] 10. Donato Wharton - 'Is That Why Yr Still On Earth' [City Centre Offices] 11. Mighty Math - 'Neon Heart Cowboy' [Different Drummer] 12. Land Of The Loops - 'Party Pooper' [Up] 13. Max 404 - 'Lost' [New Electronica] 14. Scorn - 'Night Tide' [Earache] 15. Ufeari - Untitled [CDR] 16. Ra - 'Adx Rebirth' [Hip Notik] 17. Howie B - 'Homeward Bound III: The Movie' [Pussyfoot] 18. Future Sound Of London - 'Spineless Jelly' [Virgin] 19. Tino - 'Living Dead Dub' [Tino Corp]
A special Thinknology mix for Hallowe'en...it's the same one that provoked reactions when it was broadcast on Coldcut's 'Solid Steel' radio show last year (thanks guys). 66.6MB in size, I hope you enjoy it here again...and, eh, don't have nightmares ;)

item.title: ThinkToy Radio Mix 025
item.description:
ThinkToy - 'Radio Mix 25'
Track Listing:
1. Marc Antona - 'One More Sugar' [Mobilee] 2. Amsterdam Assholes - 'Da Ga Mooi Nie Door Da Feest' [Dualblock] 3. Dtolio - 'Contradictable' [Progrezo] 4. Kollektiv Turmstrasse - 'Tristesse' [Connaisseur] 5. Adultnapper - 'Boltz Part 2' [Nummer] 6. Talking Heads - 'Psycho Killer' (Lexicon Avenue Remix) [White] 7. Nooncat - 'Beach' [Phlegmatek] 8. Demetucci feat. Howard Perry - 'Take My Illusion' (Demetucci Remix) [Cassagrande] 9. Alec Troniq - 'Madame Obscure' [Etui] 10. Alex Carbo - 'Cyclone' [Etui] 11. Monoroom - 'Black Sunglasses' [Session Deluxe] 12. Danton Eeprom - 'One Thing Leads To Another' (Tigerskin Mix) [Tsuba] 13. Jeff Bennett - 'I Thought It Was' [Kickin'] 14. DJ Sodeyama - 'Butterflynoise' [Zenit] 15. Andrea Doria & Alex D'elia - 'Summertime' [BluFin]
Reference times of each track within the mix can be found at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm.

item.description:

Alex Neri & Luca Bacchetti - 'La Fotografia' [Tenax] 12. Ame - 'Rej' [Defected] 13. Butch - 'Mushrooms Of Happiness' [Craft Music] 14. Ascii Disko - 'Hey' (2007 Remake) [Moonbootique]
Reference times of each track within the mix can be found at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm. A hi-quality 256k stereo mp3 copy of this mix is also available upon request.

item.title: ThinkToy Radio Mix 022 (Vox Version)
item.description:
ThinkToy - 'Radio Mix 22' (Vox Version)
Track Listing:
1. Spektre - 'Dark Horse' (Audiofly Remix) [Dance Electric] 2. Anja Schneider - 'Belize' [Mobilee] 3. Chris Carrier - 'Don't Look Back' [Adult Only] 4. Alec Troniq - 'Passengers' [Etui] 5. Jeff Bennett - 'Multipass' (Original Element) [Frosty Minimal] 6. Loco Dice - 'Orchidee' [M_nus] 7. D. Diggler - 'Graviton' (Johannes Heil Mix) [Resopal] 8. Martin Eyerer & Anthony Collins - 'Manifestation' (Paul Ritch Remix) [Session Deluxe] 9. Blood & Tears - 'Post Metrom' [KarateKlub] 10. Martin Eyerer & Stephan Hinz - 'Tucan' (Nic Fanciulli Mix) [Renaissance] 11. Monoroom - 'Zoomzoom' [Session Deluxe] 12. The Fix - 'Medication Time' [Yeah:No] 13. Ito & Star - 'Sudoko Kid' (Alexi Delano & Xpansul Remix) [Leftroom] 14. Raudive - 'Magnetic' [Music Man] 15. Eric Sneo - 'At The Pier' [MB Elektronics]
Dialogue throughout taken from the 1975 film 'One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest'.
Reference times of each track within the mix can be found at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm. A hi-quality 256k stereo mp3 copy of this mix is also available upon request.

item.title: Alexander Robotnick: Mixed By ThinkToy
item.description:
Alexander Robotnick - 'My La(te)st Album' (Mixed by ThinkToy):
1. A Coffee Shop In Rotterdam 2. Disco Sick 3. We Love The Music 4. Acid Magma 5. I'm Getting Lost In My Brain 6. Jette La Masque 7. Addio Addio 8. My Battery Is Low 9. You Are Fesh! 10. Don't Get Out, Love Me! 11. Dublin-Florence-Siena.
All tracks taken from 'My La(te)st Album' by Alexander Robotnick, released on Hot Elephant Music. Check www.robotnick.it for more info.

item.title: ThinkToy Radio Mix 020
item.description: Thinknology Radio Mix 20. Sleeparchive, Chet, Agnes, Thom Nagy, Acropod, Future Beat Investigators, TG, Chris Delay, Zwo, Jona, Minilogue, DJ Koze, Moonbeam, Paulussen & Cali, El Carlitto & Mauler are all in the mix this week. The hour long 'Radio' mixes of diverse dance & electronica make up the syndicated weekly 'Thinknology' radio show. Full track listing with reference times & preview stream is at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm.

item.title: ThinkToy Slow Spin Mix 031
item.description: Thinknology Mix: Slow Spin #31. Massive Attack, Four Tet, Hot Chip, The Herbaliser Band, Mo' Horizons, Sola Rosa, Kalahari Surfers & Butch Cassidy Sound System are in the mix this week. The 'Slow Spin' mixes are part of an ongoing series of half hour eclectic chillout mixes. Delicate synthetic sounds...from downbeat, jazz & acoustic to ambient electronica & dub. Full track listing & preview stream is at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm.

item.title: ThinkToy Radio Mix 016
item.description: Thinknology Radio Mix 16. Full track listing & preview stream is at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm. The 'Radio' mix series of diverse dance & electronica makes up the syndicated weekly 'Thinknology' radio show.

item.title: Re-Inventing Culture (iPod Video)
item.description: Re-Inventing ©ulture Video Mix (iPod video format). 24 tracks by artists such as Tricky Disco, Hexstatic, Si Begg & FSOL mixed into a 22 minute jumping jolly journey by ThinkToy, joined by various video bits & pieces borrowed from the mass media by Dizzywizard (ItIsOn). It paints a picture of the culture of the world at the turn of the millenium. This mix is in iPod video format (150Mb) but it can also be previewed & downloaded in DivX format if you follow the link at www.thinktoy.com/tv.htm. This will take you to the Stage6 website which also includes the full track listing.

item.title: ThinkToy Radio Mix 009 - James Brown Pt. 1
item.description: Thinknology Radio Mix 09. This is part 1 of a special James Brown mix to briefly showcase his overwhelming influence on funk, soul & popular music as we know it. His music legacy will be far reaching. R.I.P. James. Full track listing & preview stream is at www.thinktoy.com/thinkmix.htm.
